Class AbstractDirectoryScannerPlugin

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractScannerPlugin<I,D>
      • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractResourceScannerPlugin<I,FileDescriptor>

          • com.buschmais.jqassistant.plugin.common.api.scanner.AbstractDirectoryScannerPlugin
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ScannerPlugin<File,FileDescriptor>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ClassPathDirectoryScannerPlugin, TestReportDirectoryScannerPlugin

    public abstract class AbstractDirectoryScannerPlugin
extends AbstractContainerScannerPlugin<File,File>
    Abstract base implementation for directory scanners.

      • getEntries

        protected Iterable<? extends File> getEntries(File container)
                                       throws IOException
        Description copied from class: AbstractContainerScannerPlugin
        Return an iterable which delivers the entries of the container.

        The entries must not contain the relative root element, i.e. "/".

        Specified by:
        getEntries in class AbstractContainerScannerPlugin<File,File>
        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        Returns:
        The iterable of entries.
        Throws:
        IOException - If the entries cannot be determined.

      • getRelativePath

        protected String getRelativePath(File container,
                                 File entry)
        Description copied from class: AbstractContainerScannerPlugin
        Return the relative path of an element within the container.

        The following conditions must be considered:

        • The separator to use is "/".
        • The path must start with "/".
        • The path must not end with "/".

        Specified by:
        getRelativePath in class AbstractContainerScannerPlugin<File,File>
        Parameters:
        container - The container.
        entry - The entry.
        Returns:
        The relative path.
